programme.desc: Leeds Rhinos v St Helens (Kick-off 8.00pm). Coverage of the top-flight encounter, which takes place at Headingley, as two of the biggest names in the sport go head to head. The Rhinos have shown signs of improvement in recent weeks and have begun to rise up the table, as they continue to chase Castleford Tigers at the top of the standings. Meanwhile, Saints are having an inconsistent campaign, and will be wary of falling further down the league and dropping out of contention for the Super 8s

programme.title: Live ATP Tennis
programme.desc: The AEGON International. Coverage of day three from the Devonshire Park Lawn Tennis Club in Eastbourne, featuring third-round matches. This is the first time the men's edition of the tournament has been held since 2014, with Spain's Feliciano Lopez being the most recent winner. Lopez overcame Richard Gasquet in the final that year, defeating the Frenchman 6-3, 6-7, 7-5 to retain the title he had won in 2013

programme.title: Spanish league - Naj tekme sezone: Granada - Real Madrid (0:4)
programme.desc: Španska nogometna liga, bolj poznana pod vzdevkom La Liga, je najelitnejše nogometno tekmovanje v Španiji. Ustanovljena je bila leta 1929. V ligi nastopa 20 klubov, kjer vsako sezono nekdo postane prvak in izpade v špansko drugo ligo. Najuspešnejša kluba sta madridski Real in Barcelona. Skupaj sta ligo osvojila kar 55 krat. Zadnji naslov je romal v roke Barcelone

programme.title: Svetovna liga, 2. skupina - 1/2 finale 1: Slovenija - Nizozemska
programme.desc: Slovenski odbojkarji so svoje delo v drugi skupini svetovne lige za zdaj opravili z odliko in se na zaključni turnir v Avstraliji uvrstili z enim samim porazom. V polfinalu zaključnega turnirja jih čakajo Nizozemci, proti katerim odkrito napadajo uvrstitev v veliki finale. Glede na formo izbrancev Slobodana Kovača, uvrstitev v finale ne bi smela biti vprašljiva

programme.desc: Turnir v Halleju je stalnica v travnatem delu teniške sezone in ga številni poznajo pod imenom Gerry Weber, ki daje ime tudi glavnemu stadionu v tem nemškem mestu. V Halleju je svoj povratek v teniške arene napovedal tudi sam Roger Federer, ki bo imel v Dominicu Thiemu, Keiu Nišikoriju, Alexandru Zverevu in ostalih več kot dostojno konkurenco. programme.title: WTA Premier Birmingham - Finale: Kvitova - Barty
programme.desc: Turnir v Birminghamu bo letos predstavljal pravo generalko pred Wimbledonom, saj bomo na turnirju videli kar sedem igralk iz prve deseterice na čelu s trenutno prvo igralko sveta Angelique Kerber. Pred letom dni je bila najboljša Američanka Madison Keys, letos pa bo veliko oči uprtih predvsem v Jeleno Ostapenko, latvijsko senzacijo, ki je slavila na Roland Garrosu. programme.title: Svetovna liga, 2. skupina - Finale: Slovenija - Japonska
programme.desc: Slovenska odbojkarska reprezentanca je na krilih Mitje Gasparinija v polfinalu zaključnega turnirja v Avstraliji odpihnila Nizozemsko, ki ni niti v enem trenutku ogrozila zmago izbrancev Slobodana Kovača. Slovence v finalu čaka Japonska, ki je v drugem polfinalu z zmago proti Avstraliji utišala domače navijače, vendarle pa se zdi, da bo našo reprezentanco težko presenetila(n)

programme.title: Champions Tour Learning Center *
programme.desc: World Golf Hall of Fame member Nick Faldo made just the ninth PGA Champions start of his career last week in Madison, Wis. The six-time major champion shares his putting knowledge. John Daly shares details on what he considers the best ace of his life, and has a practice drill to help shave strokes in the short game. Gene Sauers prepares to defend his U.S. Senior Open title with a preview of the 2017 venue in suburban Boston. Sauers tutors Boston Bruins hockey legend Ray Bourque on chipping. (cc)

programme.title: School of Golf
programme.sub-title: KPMG Women's PGA Championship Special from Olympia Fields Country Club
programme.desc: Martin Hall and Blair O'Neal are headed to Olympia Fields Country Club to teach the short game shots the LPGA's best face in the KPMG Women's PGA Championship. There is also a special lesson with five-time major champion Phil Mickelson on what makes him one of the greatest of all-time with a wedge. Numerous LPGA players in the field stop by to share how they prepare for a major venue, and no trip to the Chicago area would be complete without a lesson in dealing with Windy City conditions. (cc)

programme.desc: Ralph and son start off the season with action-packed hunts on opposite sides of the U.S. After an up-close thriller with a Kentucky velvet buck, Ralph travels to the backcountry of Wyoming in search of his first elk(n)

programme.title: Team Fitzgerald Vintage Country Lifestyle
programme.desc: Dan and Guy battle the extreme icy, snowy, subzero Michigan winter to connect on a beautiful late season hoss buck with Mathews Bows(n)

programme.title: Major League Bowhunter
programme.desc: Part 1. Duff heads up to southeastern Montana to hunt riverbottom whitetails. While using tradtional hunting methods in the familiar river ground, Duff decides to think outside the box and ambush the moving deer from the ground(n)

programme.title: Bowhunter TV
programme.desc: Curt Wells relives the years of moose-hunting memories that have added up to a full-blown moose curse(n)

programme.title: Trained Assassins
programme.desc: Part 1. Cragg Fitz and Ryan Wascom head to the legendary Holden Pasture lease to hunt with the owner/creator of Double Down Deer Feed in Texas(n)

programme.title: In-Fisherman
programme.desc: The staff travles to some of the greatest fisheries in North America. They fish the Yukon River for gargantuan pike, fly in to a multispecies in northern Saskatchewan and reveal what it takes to catch two-pound bluegills(n)

programme.title: Reel Time With Florida Sportsman
programme.desc: Captain George Gozdz fishes for full moon snapper near St. Pete Beach, Fla(n)

programme.title: North American Whitetail Television
programme.desc: Dr. James Kroll and Gordon Whittington tag-team Wyoming whitetails on an early-season crossbow hunt; Dr. Deer discusses the growing threat of mountain lion predation; and we examine supplemental water sources(n)

programme.title: Whitetail Fix
programme.desc: The guys freshen things up a bit. Mike Marsteller showcases the highlights of his hometown Hoosier hunts, as well as his voyage to Kansas during the rut(n)

programme.title: Whitetail Explorer
programme.desc: Stan's son, Tim Potts, is after a 180" central Illinois giant. He changes strategies and moves his stand to try and outsmart this old buck. Tim also takes his kids hunting during the Illinois shotgun season(n)

programme.title: Dominant Bucks
programme.desc: Learn the Dominant Buck tactics of buck hunter Chad Rushing. Chad illustrates several unique methods he uses when hunting his home farm in Illinois(n)

programme.title: Respect the Game TV *
programme.desc: Whether stalking mule deer or sitting in a stand, both prove to be successful methods when hunting. Bill Buckingham and Mike McFerrin show both methods(n)

programme.title: Big Deer TV
programme.desc: Part 1. Like moths to flame, Mike Hanback and friends are drawn to the Red Hills of Oklahoma for the November rut. Trijicon's Chuck Wahr encounters a big buck in shifting winds and Mike hits the ground with Scott Sanderford of Croton Creek Outfitters(n)

programme.title: GunVenture
programme.desc: Tom and Ryan head north for some scattergun fun. While one heads to South Dakota for a pheasant hunt, the other heads to Michigan to rouse some grouse. Also: a custom-fitting with Dr. Shotgun for Tom and a fun drive in a 1973 fire truck for Ryan(n)

programme.title: Guns & Gear
programme.desc: Hitting the range with the latest releases: Sig Sauer rifles and the XD-E from Springfield Armory. Also: check out the new Founder Series holsters from CrossBreed Holsters, tactical clothing from Propper; Liberty Safe handgun vaults and more(n)

programme.title: Jon Baker's Guide 4 Adventure
programme.desc: After surviving a 400 ft fall during a mountain goat hunt, Jon brings his new outlook on life to the forefront(n)

programme.title: Beyond The Divide
programme.sub-title: Feral Goats and Pigs of the NSW Tablelands
programme.desc: In New South Wales early gold prospectors introduced goats that have now multiplied and become a pest. Late winter is prime time for hunting goats(n)

programme.title: Trailing the Hunter's Moon
programme.desc: Hunting black bears is a proud American tradition. Blake Barnett and friends learn that following hounds is far from easy as they pursue the black bears of Angel Fire, N.M(n)

programme.title: Trijicon's World of Sports Afield
programme.sub-title: Mongolia - A Quest for Argali Pt. 1
programme.desc: Part 1. Dan Catlin heads on an expedition to the legendary sheep pastures of Mongolia. A quest for the world's largest wild sheep is at hand, as Dan and his team chase both dreams and argalis(n)

programme.title: Hornady's Dark & Dangerous
programme.sub-title: When Africa Is in Your Blood, There Is No Cure
programme.desc: Rich and Jim cover guns, ammo and more for the AR-15; the guys talk carry-gun break-in; and they debate the merits of 9mm vs. .45 ACP in the 1911 pistol(n)

programme.title: Petersen's Hunting Adventures
programme.desc: Donna Boddington attends the Wyoming Women's Antelope Hunt and mentors a young teacher on her first hunt. Both gals hunt hard and take their prairie goats in a walk-up spot-and-stalk hunt(n)

programme.title: Savage Outdoors
programme.desc: Mike Stroff is on his way to Saskatchewan for a black bear hunt with his bow. Mike is able to locate some giant black bears and even a few color faze bears. This hunt would prove to be one of the best black bear hunts Mike has ever been on(n)

programme.title: Buckventures' The Woodsman
programme.desc: Jeff Danker heads to the sandhills of Nebraska to chase giant mule deer(n)

programme.title: Huntin' the Backwoods
programme.desc: The rut is on in Ohio and the Backwoods Boys are fired up. Buck Bomb's Mike Homan puts the Blue Bow to the test on a great big Ohio buck, and Dan Wallace follows up from the same stand with the same bow on another Ohio stud(n)

programme.title: Out-There TV
programme.desc: Corey heads out with Mike Dickess of Mike's Archery, as he landed a mountain goat tag for Colorado that took him 30 years to get(n)
